name: Miniz Adventure
description:
Fast Fingers and Agility.
That´s what you’ll need to deal with time and distance of each movements in order to complete short and dynamic levels.
Gamer´success depends on a perfect combination of strategy and a lot of skill.
Download just right now and enjoy each level adrenaline the game'll provide you.



  • Dozens of super dynamic levels.
  • Engaging soundtrack.
  • Statistics and records.
  • Simple and precise character´s controlling.
  • A incredible game full of challenges and secrets.
